resources.string: The app for this icon isn\'t installed. You can remove it, or search for the app and install it manually.
Each work app has a badge and is kept secure by your organization. Move apps to your Home screen for easier access.
Select custom columns and rows count
No more room in the Favorites tray
Double-tap & hold to pick up a widget or use custom actions.
Double-tap & hold to pick up a shortcut or use custom actions.
Touch & hold to pick up a shortcut.
Touch & hold to pick up a widget.
To show Notification Dots, turn on app notifications for %1$s
%1$s is not allowed to make phone calls
No more room on this Home screen.
Allows an app to add shortcuts without user intervention.
Allows the app to read the settings and shortcuts in Home.
Allows the app to change the settings and shortcuts in Home.
Downloaded app disabled in Safe mode
This is a system app and can\'t be uninstalled.
